inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of thoracic aortic aneurysm defined by the following parameters - Women: at the level of the sinus of valsalva >39mm, or ascending aorta >42mm. - Men: at the level of the sinus of valsalva >44mm, or ascending aorta >46mm.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients on continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) therapy for OSA at baseline.
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Daughter has also noted compliance with BiPap at night.

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known central sleep apnoea.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient presents with agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 70s on BipAp with 5L. Pt agitated then somnolent at initial presentation.
